title: Video: Chloe Black – Breaking Bad
content:
As much as I love Breaking Bad, it could do with new opening credits music, right? Well London via LA songstress Chloe Black may well have found the answer, with her fantastic new track, Breaking Bad.

Perhaps more Bond than Heisenberg, it sits somewhere between Adele and Amy Winehouse, soulful whilst retaining it’s pop foundations. Watch out 2014, Chloe Black is coming to get you. Thanks to DN for the tip.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
